transport_shuttle_before:
This year, only the regular TCAT transport service can be used, for the price of one ticket per person.

Bus stop: Technopole (Line 6, 8 or 11) or UTT (Line 8).

More information on the TCAT network and the lines serving our event below:
transport_shuttle_after:
From 9.30 pm, a free shuttle is set up between the Beurnonville roundabout (near the center of public finances and the CNAM) and the parking of the UTT.
See the schedules below.
transport_car:
From Paris
 - Motorway A5: exit n°20 (Sainte Savine)
 - N60 follow Troyes
 - Bypass ring road
 - Follow Technopole de l’Aube

From Reims
 - Motorway A26: exit n°21 (Saint Thibault)
 - N71 follow Troyes
 - Bypass ring road
 - Follow Technopole de l’Aube

From Dijon
 - Motorway A5: exit n°21 (Saint Thibault)
 - N71 follow Troyes
 - Bypass ring road
 - Follow Technopole de l’Aube

A parking lot of about a hundred places is available near the UTT for people arriving by car.
transport_train: From Paris : TER Gare de l’Est to Troyes.
rule_security:
For obvious security reasons and a reason of the plan 'VIGIPIRATE SECURITE RENFORCEE - RISK ATTACK', we remind you that dangerous devices such as firearms or knives are prohibited inside Cassiopée, without exception.
A search will be carried out before any entry, causing the confiscation of any material that could pose a security problem (razor, aerosol, ...).
rule_mask: Due to the sanitary measures against COVID-19, wearing a mask is mandatory throughout the site and throughout the event.
rule_identity: An identity document (driver's license, identity card or passport) is required in order to be able to enter the event. The organizers reserve the right of access.
rule_dresscode:
A Gala outfit is required. A free cloakroom will be at your disposal throughout the evening.

Are allowed :
 - Evening dress or tailor
 - Suit
 - Shirt
 - Chinos
 - City shoes

Are prohibited :
 - Blue-jean
 - Tracksuit
 - Trainer (sneaker)

Anyone who does not respect the dress code of the evening may be refused entry by the organizers.
rule_prevention_2021:
It is important to us to ensure the safety and protect the health of each participant. For this reason, we set up several devices: 

- Verification of the wearing of the mask on the event 
- Hydroalcoholic gel terminals 
- Cleaning of equipment on stage between each artist 
- Ear plugs.
rule_prevention:
Everyone's safety is our priority. Whether it is during the evening or to come and go, it is important to us to ensure the safety and preserve the health of each participant. We therefore want to avoid any incident related to In the evenings.
In order to achieve these objectives, several systems are set up free of charge:

- Shuttle between the UTT and downtown Troyes
- Disposable breathalysers (including breathalyzers for young drivers)
- Electronic breathalyzer
- Ear plugs
- Condoms
- Cup lids
- Prevention and awareness stand
- Trusted people
- Display

We are also setting up 3 others schemes in partnership with associations specializing in this area:

- A prevention and awareness stand held by the National Association for Alcohol and Addiction Prevention (ANPAA).
- Traffic in the evening of 'Charlies', offering water, cakes or just conversation, in partnership with the Association Revivre.
- A bar without alcohol, also held in partnership with the Association Revivre.
rule_ecology: The environmental aspect is becoming increasingly important in today's society, and in our event as well. An increasing part of our budget is allocated to this component. Whether before, during or after our event, we are setting up more and more measures to reduce, sort and recycle waste.
rule_local: In order to promote regional products, Cassiopée partners mainly with local suppliers. This year, you have the opportunity to support them by purchasing their products directly on the day of our event.
rule_social: In order to make the event more accessible, places are offered to the beneficiaries of the Agoraé and preferential rates are set up for students.
rule_credits_two: student at the University of Technology in Troyes
first_launching_slide_one: Discover now all the information of the biggest event of Champagne-Ardenne entirely organized by students.
first_launching_slide_two: Among the functionalities, you can access the ticket office, consult the events of the evening and the shuttle schedules, discover the artists, add your ticket or even note your cloakroom number during the evening ;-).
first_launching_slide_three: The developer is actively working to offer you other new features so check your updates regularly, the rest is coming soon ...
first_launching_slide_one_2021: Completely redesigned for Cassiopée 2020 (forever in our hearts), the application has been transformed again this year for our special edition.
first_launching_slide_two_2021: Discover the artists, activities, events and much more information of this incredible day.
first_launching_slide_three_2021: For other new features and future features, don't forget to activate the updates.

map_id15_selling:
Enter the Greco-Roman atmosphere of our bar, we will plunge you into the atmosphere of one of the most famous hotels in the world : Caesar Palace!
The beer fountains will remind you of the Roman thermal baths with the sweet Blanche de Namur to quench your thirst. Pay homage to Bachus by enjoying the intoxicating music and let it be the muse of your evening!

map_id17_description:
Rugby is the story of a ball with friends around and when there is no more ball, there are still friends. You like partying and friends, you know where to find us!

To spend an extraordinary Gala, come to join us in our EAT to find you in the atmosphere of Very Bad Trip with of course the conviviality and the good atmosphere recognized worldwide of the PMOMs.
